item.title: Translating a chord to the help key in terminfo
item.description: Original article man terminfo tmux tmux is great for translating key bindings. I decided that I’d like M-C-] to be translated into the help key. However, tmux has no notion of the help key. It can’t be done in tmux. emacs Emacs can interpret the chord as the help key. 1 (define-key key-translation-map (kbd "C-M-]") (kbd "<help>")) However, this only works in emacs. Other programs respond to the help key.
